dependencies.@grpc/grpc-js: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use 1.9.15 for Node v8. Small chance v1.10.x may work, but not tested.
dependencies.ajv: This package dropped support for older node versions and requires the ajv package to be recompiled. Use v6.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.ajv-keywords: This package documents that v3 should be used when using ajv v6
dependencies.applicationinsights: This package requires Node v8 in 2.0.0+ as it now includes OpenTelemetry packages. Use v1.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.aws-sdk: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use 2.1018.0 for Node < v10.
dependencies.commander: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v2.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.google-auth-library: This package is used for GRPC connection, supports node v10 and above, but fromJSON function works in node v8.11.1 - should use v6.1.X only
dependencies.json-duplicate-key-handle: This package is included locally to track updates and/or vulnerabilities. Included version is v1.0.0
dependencies.jsonwebtoken: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v8.5.1 for Node v8.
dependencies.kafka-node: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v2.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.prom-client: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v11.X.Y for Node v4. Cannot go higher than 11.0.0 because of syntax failures on test_node4.

devDependencies.@f5devcentral/eslint-config-f5-atg: This package is updated on as-needed basis due to the work overhead.
devDependencies.@sinonjs/samsam: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v8.0.0 for Node v8. Required to enable mocha tests.
devDependencies.@sinonjs/fake-timers: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use 11.2.2 for Node v8. Required to enable mocha tests.
devDependencies.chai: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v4.X.Y for Node v8.
devDependencies.mocha: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v7.2.0 for Node v8.
devDependencies.nock: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v11.X.Y for Node v8.
devDependencies.nyc: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v14.X.Y for Node v8.
devDependencies.sinon: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v15.X.Y for Node v8.
devDependencies.ssh2: This packaged dropped support for older node versions. Use v0.X.Y for Node >= v5.2 and <= v10.16
devDependencies.winston: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v3.5.1 for Node v8.
